protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: High affinity receptor for N-formyl-methionyl peptides, which are powerful neutrophils chemotactic factors. Binding of FMLP to the receptor causes activation of neutrophils. This response is mediated via a G-protein that activates a phosphatidylinositol-calcium second messenger system

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
